headline: A Look At Diamondback Energy (FANG) Valuation After Barnett And Woodford Expansion Plans And Capital Returns
summary: Diamondback Energy (FANG) is back in focus after a packed earnings week, combining new Barnett and Woodford growth plans with sizable impairments, fresh production guidance, higher dividends, and a larger completed share buyback. See our latest analysis for Diamondback Energy. The mixed reaction to Diamondback’s earnings, impairments and new production plans has come with a 1 day share price return of 4.25% to US$174.07. This builds on a 30 day share price return of 8.61% and a 5 year total...
